question: What characterizes a Dirac-type tracer input in solute transport modeling? (Mark ALL correct answers)
success: ✅ Correct. A Dirac input is a short, concentrated pulse with a defined mass.
error: ❌ Remember that Dirac inputs are used to simulate instantaneous tracer releases.
